headline: Exelon (EXC): Assessing Valuation with Shares Trading Near Recent Highs
summary: Exelon (EXC) shares have seen modest moves recently, even as utility stocks drift due to mixed market sentiment. Investors might be eyeing the company’s consistent performance, with Exelon’s returns over the past year standing at 22%. See our latest analysis for Exelon. Exelon’s share price has climbed 21.5% year-to-date and is currently trading at $45.75, reflecting growing investor confidence in the utility sector. With a steady 22.5% total shareholder return over the past year, momentum...
